item.dc:creator: themeeditor

We will be in touch with you shortly.","redirect_to":"0","custom_page":"2","external_url":"","layout_class":"default","form_class":"","submit_button_text":"Submit","email":{"evf_to_email":"themegrill@gmail.com","evf_from_name":"Suffice","evf_from_email":"wordpress@demo.themegrill.com","evf_email_subject":"New Form Entry","evf_email_message":"{all_fields}"}},"structure":{"row_1":{"grid_1":["name","email","subject","message"]}}}

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: demo@themegrill
item.content:encoded: Welcome to ThemeGrill Demo. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
Perfect for Agency

We are passionate about design.

Read More

Focused on Quality

Get your website to prefessional level.

Read More
Clean Code

OUR TEAM

Web Developer

Web Designer

Graphic Designer

CEO

    Web Master

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
This contact form is created using Everest Forms. To download this contact form plugin click here.

This contact form is just for demo purpose. If you have any theme related support questions, please put your query in our support forum http://themegrill.com/support-forum/.
And if you have any theme related sales questions or if you just want to say hello, please send your message via our contact page http://themegrill.com/contact/.

item.title: Right Sidebar
item.dc:creator: themeeditor
item.content:encoded:
This page has its layout set to Right Sidebar. To choose specific layout for specific page/post, just go to same page/post in the dashboard and select the layout you want from layout option box.

item.title: One Click Demo Import
item.dc:creator: demo@themegrill
item.content:encoded:
Well! we know your time is precious. So creating a site like our demo is just a few click away.

 

Our theme when installed automatically recommends you to install our famous One click Demo install plugin ThemeGrill Demo Importer. And you are just a few clicks away from creating a site exactly like our demo. Once demo content is installed feel free to edit and give it your personal touch.
